title: Lemon–Garlic Yogurt Dressing
description: A bright, creamy, high-protein dressing that pairs well with Creole-seasoned chicken, arugula, kale, sweet potato, and chickpeas.
ingredients: 1 tbsp lemon juice (≈ juice of 1/3 lemon)
instructions: Whisk together Greek yogurt, lemon juice, and olive oil until smooth.
Add garlic powder, Creole seasoning, and maple syrup.
Season with a pinch of salt and adjust maple syrup to taste.
Use immediately or refrigerate for up to 3 days.
notes: For a thinner dressing, add 1–2 tsp cold water. Excellent with Creole–Maple Air Fryer Chicken.
